P9STGBS.question: To what extent do you feel that most people can be trusted, or that you need to be cautious when dealing with others?

values.2: One can never be too careful in dealing with others

P48ST.description: Perception of honesty in political expression
P48ST.question: Do you think most people say what they really think about politics, or not?

values.1: They say what they think about politics
values.2: They usually do not say what they really think
